# target

**Type Property**

The target of the animation.

## Declaration

```swift
static let target: NSViewAnimation.Key
```

## Discussion

The target can be either an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView] object or an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow] object. This property is required.

## Keys

- **effect**: An effect to apply to the animation.
- **endFrame**: The size and location of the window or view at the end of the animation.
- **startFrame**: The size and location of the window or view at the start of the animation.
